# GroupActivityActivationResult.activationPreferred

**Case**

A result that indicates the user wants to share the activity with the group.

## Declaration

```swift
case activationPreferred
```

## Discussion

When you receive this result in your completion handler, call the [doc://com.apple.GroupActivities/documentation/GroupActivities/GroupActivity/activate()] method of your [doc://com.apple.GroupActivities/documentation/GroupActivities/GroupActivity] type to advertise the activity to other participants in the group.

## Getting the activation results

- **GroupActivityActivationResult.activationDisabled**: A result that indicates the user disabled the automatic sharing of activities, or prefers to perform the activity locally.
- **GroupActivityActivationResult.cancelled**: A result that indicates the user canceled the activation request.
